review: It works great, and I love Amazon
author: steve

review: This stick makes almost perfect media center. I don't care much about amazon's content and just needed a media center for my not-so-smart TV capable of running xbmc (kodi), plex, netflix and dish anywhere. Fire stick can do all of this. I have tried several android TV boxes and sticks before, but this stick is much better, faster, more reliable and has a decent remote.
author: Eugene

review: The Fire stick is awesome! I had been looking for something that would allow me to view Amazon Instant Prime Videos, Netflix, and Showtime Anytime, with out having to switch between 3 different devices. And the choice of things to watch, is amazing! Now, if only some service,other than cable (or going with an over-the-air antenna ), would offer my local channels, I could really reduce my cable bill!!Thanks Amazon!
author: Susan Blackmer
